attributes.action: prevent bonus payments to RBS Directors and staff for 2008-2009
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Under the present economic circumstances and given the recent history of RBS the proposed bonuses for Directors and staff of is deemed to be completely unacceptable and is indeed an insult to the British taxpayer

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
